levels.description:
Passive: Summons may be deployed on melee tiles. If there are other summons within their Attack Range, combines with them into a <@ba.vup>Higher form</>
Active: Ling and her summons gain <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> ATK and <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</> DEF. Each summon deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Ling's ATK as Arts damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles every <@ba.vup>{interval}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>After the skill ends, gain 1 summon</>
